msContents.summary: The second part of the commentary of Japheth ben Ali on the book of Isaiah.

collation.p: 26 quires of 10 leaves each, with exception of the 1st and 10th which have 8 leaves each, and the 2nd and 26th which have 9 and 6 leaves respectively. Quires signed with Hebrew letters and Arabic words on the upper margin of the first page.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Yefet. Commentary on Isaiah. Arabic. Vol. II. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2501.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [252v].
